channel.title: Why is my downloading so skrewed
channel.description:
OK EVERY time i download something it starts out fine.itll get to like 2 more minutes until it's done and then it stops. The speed goes down and the time goes up. I hit stop,and then restart and it says download is complete,which its not its only halfway downloaded. Any fixes?
I'm using fire fox,Ie,and opera,and on all three it does it. My internet provider is bell south,and it does it with any download from any site.oh and im using Microsoft Windows XP perfesional version 2002,service pack 2.

item.title: Why is my downloading so skrewed
item.dc:creator: @Eh_Pretty_Easy Eh Pretty Easy
item.description:
@Eh_Pretty_Easy wrote:

I have this exact problem, I start downloading something and like at 55% the downloading just stops. It isn’t just one site, this happens for everything I download and I’ve had this problem for like a week or something.

Read full topic

item.title: Why is my downloading so skrewed
item.dc:creator: @Java_Pker Java Pker
item.description:
@Java_Pker wrote:

yeah i had this with Unbunti i waited 1 fu**ing hour staring at the download timer then it crashed like 3 mins away, GOD DAM IT… well yeah i ran a virus scan, then restarted my comp and everything was dandy andy

item.title: Why is my downloading so skrewed
item.dc:creator: @VB7_Rocks VB7 Rocks
item.description:
@VB7_Rocks wrote:

Could you at least tell us what browser and OS you are using? Who is your internet service provider?

We can’t really help you without that info.

Also, is it just a certain file or website that’s giving you problems (i.e rapidshare), or is it any download?

Read full topic
